sn44.6:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn44.6:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākoṭṭhikena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn44.6:1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.6:1.4: “‘kiṃ nu kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti …pe…
sn44.6:1.5: ‘kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.6:1.7: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.6:1.8: Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.6:2.1: “Rūpārāmassa kho, āvuso, rūparatassa rūpasammuditassa rūpanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.6:2.3: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.6:2.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:2.5: Vedanārāmassa kho, āvuso, vedanāratassa vedanāsammuditassa, vedanānirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:2.8: viññāṇārāmassa kho, āvuso, viññāṇaratassa viññāṇasammuditassa viññāṇanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:2.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:3.1: Na rūpārāmassa kho, āvuso, na rūparatassa na rūpasammuditassa, rūpanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:3.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:3.6: na viññāṇārāmassa kho, āvuso, na viññāṇaratassa na viññāṇasammuditassa, viññāṇanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:3.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:3.8: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
sn44.6:4.1: “Siyā panāvuso, aññopi pariyāyo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.6:4.3: Bhavārāmassa kho, āvuso, bhavaratassa bhavasammuditassa, bhavanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:4.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:4.5: Na bhavārāmassa kho, āvuso, na bhavaratassa na bhavasammuditassa, bhavanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:4.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:4.7: Ayampi kho, āvuso, pariyāyo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
sn44.6:5.1: “Siyā panāvuso, aññopi pariyāyo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.6:5.3: Upādānārāmassa kho, āvuso, upādānaratassa upādānasammuditassa, upādānanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:5.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:5.5: Na upādānārāmassa kho, āvuso, na upādānaratassa na upādānasammuditassa, upādānanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:5.6: ‘neva, hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:5.7: Ayampi kho, āvuso, pariyāyo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
sn44.6:6.1: “Siyā panāvuso, aññopi pariyāyo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.6:6.3: Taṇhārāmassa kho, āvuso, taṇhāratassa taṇhāsammuditassa, taṇhānirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.6:6.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.6:6.5: Na taṇhārāmassa kho, āvuso, na taṇhāratassa na taṇhāsammuditassa, taṇhānirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.6:6.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.6:6.7: Ayampi kho, āvuso, pariyāyo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
sn44.6:7.1: “Siyā panāvuso, aññopi pariyāyo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.6:7.2: “Ettha dāni, āvuso sāriputta, ito uttari kiṃ icchasi?
sn44.6:7.3: Taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttassa, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhuno vaṭṭaṃ natthi paññāpanāyā”ti.
